amendment.description: An amendment numbered 157 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds from being used to deploy United States Armed Forces to Ukraine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
